name: The High Life (itch)
description: This game isn't much yet, but that's the point! This story is going along as a text-based adventure that I'm programming solely in BATCH. It even runs on command prompt. It's just a small demo for now, but I think that it'll become a lot for now.  I aim for at least monthly to every other month updates. If you want to show your support, consider joining the discord!  Discord: https://discord.gg/tVFypJy
